trans-unit.source: Specifies how a user starts cell editing in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用者要如何開始進行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中的儲存格編輯。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉型別由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> values except for EditProgrammatically allow a user to double-click a cell to begin editing it.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>除了 EditProgrammatically 值可以讓使用者按兩下開始編輯儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Specify the Edit Mode for the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-specify-the-edit-mode-for-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 指定的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的編輯模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-specify-the-edit-mode-for-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Editing begins when the cell receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 當儲存格收到焦點時，編輯即會開始。

trans-unit.source: This mode is useful when pressing the TAB key to enter values across a row, or when pressing the ENTER key to enter values down a column.
trans-unit.target: 當按下 TAB 鍵在資料列之間輸入值，或是按下 ENTER 鍵在資料行下面輸入值時，這個模式會相當實用。

trans-unit.source: Editing begins when F2 is pressed while the cell has focus.
trans-unit.target: 當儲存格具有焦點而按下 F2 時，編輯即會開始。

trans-unit.source: This mode places the selection point at the end of the cell contents.
trans-unit.target: 這個模式會將選擇點置於儲存格內容的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Editing begins when any alphanumeric key is pressed while the cell has focus.
trans-unit.target: 當儲存格具有焦點而按下任何英數按鍵時，編輯即會開始。

trans-unit.source: Editing begins when any alphanumeric key or F2 is pressed while the cell has focus.
trans-unit.target: 當儲存格具有焦點而按下任何英數按鍵或 F2 鍵時，編輯即會開始。

trans-unit.source: Editing begins only when the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BeginEdit(System.Boolean)" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 只有當呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BeginEdit(System.Boolean)" /> 方法時，編輯作業才會開始。
